text:
Nowadays, we take pictures for granted. Our phones are flooding with so many selfies and tons of pictures from the same party or trip. Things were a little different when not everyone had a camera on their phones. Those pictures captured something special that people cherish for a lifetime. You know the feeling of looking at old printed photos, don’t you?
via GIPHY
Brining in a wave of nostalgia, Amitabh Bachchan recently shared a rare picture of himself with late actress Sridevi, Aamir Khan and Salman Khan, and it’s pure gold.
Rare pic - Amitabh Bachchan with SriDevi ji , Aamir Khan and Salman Khan During rehearsals for 'Jhumma Chumma' concert in London-Wembley Stadium~ 70,000 audience .. @SrBachchan pic.twitter.com/nxtnErLgKR — Moses Sapir (@MosesSapir) February 5, 2019
The picture was apparently clicked during the rehearsals for Jhumma Chumma concert in London’s Wembley Stadium. “Those were the days .. never before a concert at Wembley Stadium from India .. and on my insistence took Salman and Aamir for their first one ..” wrote Amitabh Bachchan in the caption.
those were the days .. never before a concert at Wembley Stadium from India .. and on my insistence took Salman and Aamir for their first one .. https://t.co/YBoAKNP6Ht — Amitabh Bachchan (@SrBachchan) February 5, 2019
Salman is all smiles with a glint in his eyes. Perhaps, that was his fanboy moment with Amitabh Bachchan.
Fans were left nostalgic.
Sir itna purana suit abhi tak rakhe hai aap pic.twitter.com/e99qfnXgn5 — भाईसाहब (@Bhai_saheb) February 5, 2019
Don't Miss 812 SHARES 468 SHARES 343 SHARES 814 SHARES 3 K SHARES
I was there that night Sir...15.09.90..11 years old! Will never forget it! Thank you for inspiring me all my life..continue to follow the principles of Agneepath! Love you! — Dr Abhinav Singh (@AbhinavSinghINR) February 6, 2019
All look so young and innocent — Silvano (@Desouza9S) February 6, 2019
Wow what a photo! Sri, Amitabh, Salman and Aamir. Brings back good memories 👍👍👍 — Farakh Azad (@farakh140) February 5, 2019
We are drowning in nostalgia already.
title: Amitabh Bachchan:Bringing In A Wave Of Nostalgia, Amitabh Bachchan Shares A Rare B&W Pic With Sridevi, Salman & Aamir
description: Brining in a wave of nostalgia, Amitabh Bachchan recently shared a rare picture of him with late actress Sridevi, Aamir Khan and Salman Khan, and it’s pure gold. The picture was apparently clicked during the rehearsals for Jhumma Chumma concert in London’s Wembley Stadium. Salman is all smiles with a glint in his eyes. Perhaps, that was his fanboy moment with Amitabh Bachchan.
